datalist.name: None
datalist.message: Invalid Dialog

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_01
datalist.message:
Lord Chronos, an enemy has appeared!
I will now explain the battle!

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_02
datalist.message:
First of all,
I will explain the game rules.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_03
datalist.message:
This displays the remaining time.
When this expires...

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_04
datalist.message:
The player with the most HP remaining
will win.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_05
datalist.message:
Also,if either player's HP gets reduced to 0
the game will end.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_01
datalist.message:
In order to reduce the enemy's HP
you will need to deploy characters
into battle.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_02
datalist.message:
It will attack when it reaches the opponent's area.
Let's deploy one now.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_03
datalist.message:
You successfully deployed it!
Characters have several parameters.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_04
datalist.message:
This is a character's HP.
When this reaches 0
they will be unable to act for a while.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_05
datalist.message:
This is a character's attack power.
The higher the value, the more damage
you will inflict on your opponent.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_06
datalist.message:
This is a character's level.
As they take action, their level will increase.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_07
datalist.message:
This is the time until movement and battle.
Characters will act when the memory runs out.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_01
datalist.message:
The enemy has been deployed!
Let's intercept with weapon cards!

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_02
datalist.message: To use cards you need to have enough MP.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_03
datalist.message:
You don't have enough MP...
Your MP will regenerate over time.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_04
datalist.message: You can also convert cards into MP.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_05
datalist.message: For now, let's wait for your MP to increase.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_06
datalist.message:
Your MP has increased!
Deploy a character in the same lane as the enemy
to have them battle.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_07
datalist.message:
When a character wins a battle
they will trigger BREAK and advance 1 step.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_08
datalist.message:
When they lose a battle
they will become unable to act for a while.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_09
datalist.message:
When you are attacked the weapon card
will be destroyed by the counterattack and returned to you.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_10
datalist.message:
Also,characters will gradually recover their HP
while they are not deployed.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_01
datalist.message: Next,I will explain how to revive characters.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_02
datalist.message:
When a character is defeated,they will become unable to deployed
until the displayed counter has expired.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_03
datalist.message:
However,if you touch the revive icon
you can revive them by paying life.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_04
datalist.message:
You successfully revived them!When you really want a character to return immediately
this is one way of doing so.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_01
datalist.message: Next,I will explain how to replenish your hand.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_02
datalist.message:
You can draw as many cards as you have card stock remaining.
Your card stock will increase over time.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_03
datalist.message:
You can draw cards for each characters
by pressing their respective draw button.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_04
datalist.message: Let's try drawing cards now.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_05
datalist.message:
Carefully observe the battle and decide
which character's card to draw!

datalist.name: Tutorial_05_01
datalist.message: Next,let's try using tool cards.

datalist.name: Tutorial_05_02
datalist.message:
When you touch a tool card
a usage icon will appear on characters that are deployed.

datalist.name: Tutorial_05_03
datalist.message: Let's try strengthening your deployed allies.

datalist.name: Tutorial_05_04
datalist.message:
Your allies have been strengthened!
Use tool cards to turn the battle in your favor.

datalist.name: Tutorial_06_01
datalist.message:
Unlike tool cards, magic cards require casting time
before they can be activated.

datalist.name: Tutorial_06_02
datalist.message:
Also,if you are defeated or enter battle with an enemy
bevor the cast finished it will fail.

datalist.name: Tutorial_06_03
datalist.message: They are very powerful if you manage to cast them!

datalist.name: Tutorial_07_01
datalist.message: You have cards but not enough MP...

datalist.name: Tutorial_07_02
datalist.message:
At times like these
you can convert your cards into MP.
Let's try it now!

datalist.name: Tutorial_07_03
datalist.message:
When you really need MP,
convert unnecessary cards to MP to overcome the crisis!

datalist.name: Tutorial_08_01
datalist.message:
Regalia is Chronos' special power
that can only be used once per battle.

datalist.name: Tutorial_08_02
datalist.message:
It can be activated when the regalia gauge is filled.
It's very powerful so time it well!

datalist.name: Tutorial_08_03
datalist.message:
This concludes the basic tutorial!
Finally,let's fight the enemy in a 2v2 battle!

datalist.name: Home_CPU3vs3_Start
datalist.message:
チュートリアル終了です。
次は3対3バトルの
COM戦に挑戦してみましょう！

datalist.name: Home_CPU3vs3_End
datalist.message:
おめでとうございます！
新たな機能が開放されました！

datalist.name: Home_CardGeneration_01
datalist.message:
さきほど手に入れた素材で
カードを生成することができます。

datalist.name: Home_CardGeneration_02
datalist.message:
『カード生成』はショップの中に
あります。

datalist.name: Home_CardGeneration_03
datalist.message:
素材が足りない時は、
対戦で素材を集めましょう！

datalist.name: Home_PartyEdit_01
datalist.message:
編集からパーティ編成へ。
キャラクターを選んで
『カードセット』を
タッチしてみましょう！

datalist.name: Home_PartyEdit_02
datalist.message:
カードセットを編集したときは
忘れずに『保存』ボタンを
押しましょう！

datalist.name: Home_PartyEdit_03
datalist.message:
私からの説明は以上ですが、
プレイの流れを見てみましょう！

datalist.name: Home_Present
datalist.message:
最後に、最高レア『絶対神ゼウス』を
プレゼントしました！
編成からカードセットに組み込もう！

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_01
datalist.message:
Lord Chronos! It's terrible!
An enemy has appeared!

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_02
datalist.message: I will explain to you how to win the battle!

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_03
datalist.message:
This is your <#ff0046>HP</color>.
You can check it with the HP bar and numbers.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_04
datalist.message:
This is the enemy's <#ff0046>HP</color>.
by reducing it to <#ff0046>0</color>
 you will win.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_05
datalist.message:
This is the remaining <#ff0046>time</color>.
When it reaches 0、the person with the most <#ff0046>HP</color> left
will win.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_06
datalist.message:
To reduce the enemy's HP
you must give <#ff0046>orders</color> to your <#ff0046>allies</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_07
datalist.message: Give orders to allied units and aim for victory!

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_01
datalist.message: Use cards to give orders to your allies.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_02
datalist.message: First,let's try <#ff0046>touching</color> a <#ff0046>weapon card</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_03
datalist.message: Weapon card information has been displayed.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_04
datalist.message: This number shows the required <#ff0046>ＭＰ</color> to use this card.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_05
datalist.message:
This shows a weapon card's <#ff0046>attack power</color>.
It tells you how much damage you will inflict.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_06
datalist.message:
This icon shows the required <#ff0046>time to move</color>.
I will explain about movement later.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_07
datalist.message: You can check the information by touching the card like this.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_08
datalist.message: Let's check the MP required to use the card.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_09
datalist.message:
This shows your <#ff0046>MP</color>.
It will increase over time.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_10
datalist.message:
It seems you don't have enough MP...
Let's <#ff0046>wait</color> a bit.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_11
datalist.message:
MP has increased!
You can now use your card.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_12
datalist.message:
Once the weapon card becomes usable
you can deploy units.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_13
datalist.message: Let's <#ff0046>touch</color> 『<#ff0046>deploy</color>』.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_14
datalist.message: It worked!

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_15
datalist.message: Units have several parameters.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_16
datalist.message:
This is a units <#ff0046>HP</color>.
When this reaches 0,they will become unable to act.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_17
datalist.message:
This is their <#ff0046>attack power</color>.
The higher the value, the more damage
you will inflict on your opponent.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_18
datalist.message:
This is their <#ff0046>level</color>.
It will increase as they take action.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_19
datalist.message: The deployed unit will move forward.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_20
datalist.message: Now、let's take a look at your <#ff0046>hand</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_21
datalist.message: The number of cards has increased.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_22
datalist.message: Cards will be added to your hand as time passes.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_23
datalist.message: You can have up to 3 cards per unit in your hand.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_24
datalist.message:
If your hand is full、
your <#ff0046>card stock</color> will increase.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_25
datalist.message:
If you have space in your hand
you will draw from your <#ff0046>card stock</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_26
datalist.message:
An enemy has appeared!
Don't rush. For now let's <#ff0046>observe</color> what happens.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_27
datalist.message:
The time required for units to move forward
differs depending on the weapon card.
Let's <#ff0046>touch</color> the <#ff0046>unit</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_28
datalist.message:
For this weapon card
when <#ff0046>3 counts</color> pass
the unit will move forward.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_29
datalist.message:
This is the time remaining until the unit moves.
When the light disappears, it will move forward.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_30
datalist.message:
When you hit an enemy
battle will begin.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_31
datalist.message:
This is the time required to <#ff0046>attack</color>.
When the light disappears they will attack.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_32
datalist.message: The battle will continue until either party's HP reaches 0.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_01
datalist.message:
The HP is flashing <#ff0046>red</color>!
At this rate they will be defeated in the next battle!

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_02
datalist.message:
To help your allies, <#ff0046>touch</color> a 
<#ff0046>tool card</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_03
datalist.message: This tool card can restore your allies' HP.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_04
datalist.message: This number show the amount of <#ff0046>HP recovered</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_05
datalist.message:
Like weapon cards, it consumes MP
Let's <#ff0046>touch</color> 『<#ff0046>use</color>』!

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_06
datalist.message:
You safely recovered HP!
Let's <#ff0046>observe</color> the rest of the battle.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_07
datalist.message:
You did it!
When you win a battle, you will trigger <#ff0046>BREAK</color> and move
forward by <#ff0046>1 space</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_08
datalist.message:
If you lose the battle, you will become <#ff0046>unable to act</color>
until the count reaches 0.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_09
datalist.message: Oh no! It's a new enemy!

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_01
datalist.message:
If this continues, our allies will be in danger!
Let's try <#ff0046>touching</color> a <#ff0046>magic card</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_02
datalist.message: This magic card can restore your allies' HP.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_03
datalist.message:
This number shows the <#ff0046>time required to activate</color>.
Unlike tool cards, magic cards require <#ff0046>casting</color>
before they can be activated.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_04
datalist.message: Let's <#ff0046>touch</color> 『<#ff0046>cast</color>』!

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_05
datalist.message:
This is the required cast time.
When it reaches <#ff0046>0</color> it will be activated.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_06
datalist.message:
Lord Chronos!
Before the battle begins、
activate your <#ff0046>Regalia</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_01
datalist.message:
Regalia is a <#ff0046>special power </color>
that can only be used <#ff0046>1 time</color> per battle.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_02
datalist.message: It can be activated when the <#ff0046>regalia gauge</color> reaches maximum.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_03
datalist.message:
Now is the time!
<#ff0046>Touch</color> to <#ff0046>activate</color> it!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_04
datalist.message:
This Regalia can <#ff0046>stop enemy movement</color>
for <#ff0046>3 counts</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_05
datalist.message:
You did it!
You arrived at the castle!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_06
datalist.message: Cause damage to the enemy!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_07
datalist.message:
When you attack the enemy,the attacking ally's weapon will be destroyed
and they will be sent back.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_08
datalist.message:
This is...!
When the remaining time gets low
<#ff0046>CLIMAX</color> will begin!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_09
datalist.message: <#ff0046>The time required for MP and card increase will be shorter!</color>

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_10
datalist.message:
<#ff0046>This concludes the basic explanation.</color>
Use <#ff0046>weapon cards</color> to <#ff0046>deploy</color> and deal the final blow!

datalist.name: Tutorial_10_01
datalist.message:
Lord Chronos.
Before the battle begins,
choose the <#ff0046>Regalia</color> you want to use.

datalist.name: Tutorial_10_02
datalist.message:
The <#ff0046>Regalia</color> has various effects.
We, the fairies of time, will help you!

datalist.name: Tutorial_10_03
datalist.message: Please touch and check!

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_01
datalist.message: Next, let's review <#ff0046>card types</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_02
datalist.message: Weapon cards can be used to 『<#ff0046>deploy</color>』 and <#ff0046>attack</color> the enemy.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_03
datalist.message:
The <#ff0046>square icon</color>, <#ff0046>sword</color> and
attack power values will be your guide.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_04
datalist.message: Tool cards can be 『<#ff0046>used</color>』 on units that are deployed.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_05
datalist.message: The <#ff0046>hexagonal icon</color> and <#ff0046>small bottle</color> will be your guide.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_06
datalist.message: Magic cards require <#ff0046>casting</color>before they can be 『<#ff0046>activated</color>』.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_07
datalist.message: The <#ff0046>round icon</color> and <#ff0046>spellbook</color> will be your guide.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_01
datalist.message:
We have gained a new ally!
let's take a look again.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_02
datalist.message: Each unit has <#ff0046>characteristics</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_03
datalist.message:
Alec is good at fighting with <#ff0046>weapon cards</color>
that have high <#ff0046>attack power</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_04
datalist.message: Lotta-chan is good at using <#ff0046>tool cards</color> and <#ff0046>magic cards</color> to <#ff0046>heal</color> allies.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_05
datalist.message: Luka-chan is good at acting <#ff0046>quickly</color> with little <#ff0046>MP</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_06
datalist.message: Let's fight by taking advantage of each character's characteristics.

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_01
datalist.message: There is another card that hasn't been explained yet!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_02
datalist.message:
I will explain about <#ff0046>Special weapon cards</color>:
<#ff0046>Sacred treasures</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_03
datalist.message:
It seems you don't have a Sacred Treasure...
Please leave this to me!
There!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_04
datalist.message: <#ff0046>Touch</color> the <#ff0046>Sacred Treasure</color> in Alec's hand.

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_05
datalist.message:
<#ff0046>Sacred Treasures</color> are powerful weapon cards.
In addition to using MP, you also need to raise the Unit's <#ff0046>level</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_06
datalist.message:
This number shows the required <#ff0046>level</color>.
If you do not meet this requirement you will not be able to deploy.

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_07
datalist.message: It seems that Alec's level is not high enough...

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_08
datalist.message:
You can raise your level by using <#ff0046>cards</color> or <#ff0046>fighting</color> but……
There!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_09
datalist.message: This time we specially raised the level!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_10
datalist.message: However, it seems that with my power alone you still don't have enough MP.

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_11
datalist.message: Use your own power to make up for the missing <#ff0046>MP</color> Lord Chronos!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_12
datalist.message:
You can convert unwanted cards into 1 MP.
<#ff0046>Touch</color> <#ff0046>MP conversion</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_13
datalist.message:
MP has increased!
<#ff0046>Touch</color> to <#ff0046>Deploy</color> the Sacred Treasure!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_14
datalist.message:
When this Sacred Treasure is deployed
it gives <#ff0046>【Exaltation III】</color> to all allies!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_15
datalist.message: Exaltation has the effect of inreasing <#ff0046>attack power</color> in each battle!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_16
datalist.message:
<#ff0046>Sacred Treasures</color> have many restrictions but in exchange
they can be the difference between victory of defeat!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_17
datalist.message:
Lord Chronos!
Continue giving <#ff0046>orders</color> to your allies. Let's fight freely!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_01
datalist.message: Thank you for your hard work, Lord Chronos!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_02
datalist.message: Next, let's challenge the COM battle with 3 allies!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_11
datalist.message: Thank you for your hard work on the tutorial!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_12
datalist.message:
Since you have cleared the tutorial,
Misha will join your team!
Let me introduce you!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_13
datalist.message: Furthermore, I have something special for you!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_21
datalist.message: You did it! Here's a special summoning ticket for you!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_22
datalist.message: Collect stamps and get <#ff0046>rewards</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_23
datalist.message: Let's use the summoning ticket to <#ff0046>summon cards</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_24
datalist.message: You can swap in your new cards by touching <#ff0046>edit deck</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_25
datalist.message: New cards can be obtained by <#ff0046>playing</color> or by <#ff0046>summoning</color> them.

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_26
datalist.message: That's all for my explanation.

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_27
datalist.message:
While you are still getting used to everything,
let's try playing the <#ff0046>story</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_28
datalist.message: Let's do our best together with our allies in the next battle!
